name: Out of Control (LenninMarte)
description:
Wanting too much control will get you out of control. How would that stack up when trying to acquire controls over the playable character to the point of overdoing it?

But don't worry too much, control drains as you use it for moving.

Which method will you use to find the ultimate way of control?

It probably lies within the ruins.

----------------------------------------------------

User Controls: Pointer Input.

========================================================

Background Music Song : Plinian - Retro Gaming Version [Royalty Free]
Music provided and produced by LonePeakMusic Video Link : https://youtu.be/uzOy_NkCVX8
